## CharityORG.useItem() method

Use an item

**Signature:**

```typescript
useItem(item: string, spend: number, convert: boolean = false): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | string | Name of item |
|  spend | number | Total to spend |
|  convert | boolean | _(Optional)_ Optional: Defaults to False. True to convert spend worth of lucky coins into this item |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if successful, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 8 GB

Use an item or convert a lucky coin into an item.
